values: 强大的；有力的；有权势的；有影响力的；效果显著的；高效的；大功率的；强劲的；激烈的；令人信服的；有说服力的；健壮的；力量大的；（对身心）有强烈作用的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 具有某种性质/倾向

sample.mean: n. 一把；难控制的人；难对付的人；少数；少量
n. 一匙；一匙的量

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 抽象动词的名词后缀, 表示"充满…(容器名词)的量"
表形容词, "有…的, 充满…的"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 书面语用词，指力量、威力或能力等非常大，非一般可比，多作引申用，有时含夸张意味。
普通用词，指事物本身具有巨在的力量、能力或权力，也可作引申用。

word_group.brief_definition: 强大工具；有力工具；有力手段
强大的动力；强大的力量
强大的武器；强有力武器
大功率的发动机；强大的发动机
强大的象征；强有力的象征
强烈的情感；强烈的情绪

bilingual.source: He sent powerful rays down to Earth.
bilingual.target: 他向地球发出强大的光线。

bilingual.source: The truth is that scent has a powerful effect on our thoughts and emotions.
bilingual.target: 事实是气味对我们的思想和情感有强大的影响。
电视是一个强大的媒体。
狮子是非常强大的动物。
海军有几艘强大的船只。

bilingual.source: The eagle is a very powerful hunter.
bilingual.target: 雄鹰是非常强大的猎手。

bilingual.source: The story is about a powerful wizard.
bilingual.target: 这个故事讲述了一位强大的巫师。

bilingual.source: The eagle is a very powerful predator.
bilingual.target: 飞鹰是非常强大的捕食者。

bilingual.source: The panther is a very powerful hunter.
bilingual.target: 黑豹是非常强大的猎手。

bilingual.source: He has a powerful team supporting him.
bilingual.target: 他有一个强大的团队支持他。

list.abstract: powerful（英 [ˈpaʊəfl]，美 [ˈpaʊərfl]），英语单词，作形容词为强大的；强有力的；大功率的。作副词为非常；很。短语搭配有powerful tool（强大工具）。例句为“That's how powerful the telephone is.（这就是电话的威力。）” powerful形容词类近义词有formidable、cogent等，相关反义词有powerless。
英国金发金嗓美妞Ellie Goulding+提名过灵魂列车和MOBO音乐奖的牙买加才子Tarrus Riley，两人对唱出「Powerful」爱的力量动听情歌

yingyinNormal.en: Is it really surprising that the most powerful man in the world should be a figure of controversy?
yingyinNormal.zh: 世上最强大的人应该成为争议的焦点，这真值得惊讶吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I knew I couldn't kill them. More powerful men than me have tried. But, if I could get them to kill each other?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道自己杀不了他们，比我更强大的人都试过了。但如果我能让他们自相残杀呢？

yingyinNormal.en: You have just delivered to me the most powerful device in the entire universe. Along with your dearest friends. And my dearest enemy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你给我送来的东西可是整个宇宙当中最最强大的神器，还捎上你最亲爱的朋友，也是我最亲爱的敌人。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Chip! Chip! Oh, Lord! As punishment she transformed him into a hideous beast. And placed a powerful spell on the castle and all who lived there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当心！哦，上帝。为了惩罚王子女巫把他变成了一头丑陋的野兽，并且给整座城堡和里面的仆人也施加了强大的魔咒。

yingyinNormal.en: I think if it were exposed to a sufficiently powerful energy source something very similar to its own signature, perhaps its molecular integrity could fail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得如果它遭遇足够强大的能量源特性类似其本身的能量，那或许它的分子完整性就会被破坏。

yingyinNormal.en: We are not powerful enough to defeat Gul'dan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以你我的力量还不足以击败古尔丹。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Powerful Presentations: Simply Stated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个强而有力的简报：简单地说。

yingyinNormal.en: But isn't it even more powerful coming from me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我来说不是更有力吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Because they had a powerful in-built advantage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为它们拥有强有力且与生俱来的长处。

yingyinNormal.en: This has been Powerful Presentations: Simply Stated.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个强而有力的简报：简单地说。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you call the only man who can arm the most powerful weapon in the world? The most powerful man in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会怎么称呼那个世界上拥有最厉害的武器的人？世界的统治者。

yingyinNormal.en: I figured out way back, if god is all powerful, he cannot be all good. And if he is all good, then he cannot be all powerful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很久以前就想明白了，如果神是全能的，那么他一定不完美，如果他是完美的，那他就不可能全能。

yingyinNormal.en: Some are great, and have a powerful impact on their audiences.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有的很棒，也对他们的听众有很大的影响力。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it's not just that, I would be England's most powerful weapon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不只如此，我会是英格兰最强力的武器。

yingyinNormal.en: You will meet the richest most powerful king on the face of this earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会遇见这个世上最富有，最有权势的国王。

yingyinNormal.en: Be sure to be careful when you remove them, the product is very powerful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 取出的时候千万小心，那玩意威力可大了。

yingyinNormal.en: And a lot of powerful men with a desire to preserve peace and protect life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 许多掌权者都想要保卫和平，保护生命。

yingyinNormal.en: Imagine a duel. Me and Conway. Now, Conway has a powerful gun, a search engine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想象一个决斗在我和康威之间展开，康威有一把厉害的枪，一个搜索引擎。

yingyinNormal.en: Since 1849, Kingsman Tailors have clothed the world's most powerful individuals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从1849年起，金士曼就为世界上最有权势的人服务。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, all these powerful guys. You can make connections here that'll last forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这都是有权有势的人，你可以在这里积累永恒的人脉。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有影响力的; 有权力的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 强大的；强有力的；大功率的；效力大的；有影响力的；影响大的
v. 授权于；使更强大；增强…的信心

word_family.mean: n. 权力；能力；本领；才智；支配力；影响力；体力；威力；力量；机械力；动力；电力；幂；乘方；指数；大量的

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of power to control people and events
sense_info_list.zh: 有影响力的; 有权力的

examination_example.sentence: Such an approach can both prompt new research as well as result in <highlight>powerful</highlight> art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的方法既可以促进新的研究，也可以催生出强大的艺术。

examination_example.sentence: Discussing the issue in private will make the <highlight>powerful</highlight> person feel less threatened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 私下讨论这个问题会让有权有势的人感到不那么受到威胁。

examination_example.sentence: Before you share your thoughts, think about what the <highlight>powerful</highlight> person cares about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你分享你的想法之前，想想那些有权有势的人在乎什么。

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of strength or force

examination_example.sentence: This movement, driven by <highlight>powerful</highlight> and diverse motivations, built a nation out of a wilderness and, shaped the character and destiny of an uncharted continent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这场运动，在强大而多样的动机的驱使下，在一片荒野上建立了一个国家，塑造了一个未知大陆的性格和命运。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Powerful</highlight> memory doesn't make my emotions any more acute or vivid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强大的记忆力并不能让我的情绪变得更加敏锐或生动。

examination_example.sentence: Join the Club is filled with too much irrelevant detail and not enough exploration of the social and biological factors that make peer pressure so <highlight>powerful</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《加入俱乐部》充斥着太多无关紧要的细节，对使同伴压力如此强大的社会和生物因素的探索不够深入。

examination_example.sentence: This is a <highlight>powerful</highlight> argument, and a scary one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个强有力的论点，也是一个可怕的论点。

examination_example.sentence: But Mauna Kea is also home to some of the world's most <highlight>powerful</highlight> telescopes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是莫纳基亚也是一些世界上最强大的望远镜的所在地。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有影响力的; 有权力的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 强大的；强有力的；大功率的；效力大的；有影响力的；影响大的
adj. 无能为力的；无影响力的；无权力的
v. 以优势力量击败；压倒；太强烈而使无法忍受
v. 授权于；使更强大；增强…的信心

word_family.mean: n. 权力；能力；本领；才智；支配力；影响力；体力；威力；力量；机械力；动力；电力；幂；乘方；指数；大量的

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of power to control people and events
sense_info_list.zh: 有影响力的; 有权力的

examination_example.sentence: It is a <highlight>powerful</highlight> communication medium that simultaneously provides permanent information across the globe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是一种强大的可同时在全球范围内提供永久信息的传播媒介。

examination_example.sentence: The most <highlight>powerful</highlight> influences occur during early childhood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最强大的影响发生在儿童早期。

examination_example.sentence: During a megathrust event, all of that stress releases and some of the world's most <highlight>powerful</highlight> earthquakes occur.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一次大型逆冲事件中，所有这些应力都会释放，世界上一些最强烈的地震发生。

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of strength or force

examination_example.sentence: Rarely has there been a better example of the power of attitude, one of our most <highlight>powerful</highlight> psychological tools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 态度的力量是我们最强大的心理工具之一，很少有比这更好的例子能说明它的力量。

examination_example.sentence: Hawking has warned the creation of <highlight>powerful</highlight> artificial intelligence will be "either the best or the worst thing, ever to happen to humanity".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 霍金警告到，强大的人工智能(AI)的创造将是“对人类而言是最好的，也可能是最坏的事情”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有影响力的; 有权力的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 以优势力量击败；压倒；太强烈而使无法忍受
v. 授权于；使更强大；增强…的信心
adj. 无能为力的；无影响力的；无权力的
adj. 强大的；强有力的；大功率的；效力大的；有影响力的；影响大的

word_family.mean: n. 权力；能力；本领；才智；支配力；影响力；体力；威力；力量；机械力；动力；电力；幂；乘方；指数；大量的

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of strength or force

examination_example.sentence: Make cars that are less <highlight>powerful</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生产动力较弱的汽车。

examination_example.sentence: What's the point of producing an engine that is <highlight>powerful</highlight> enough to go like 200 kilometers an hour?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造一个时速200公里的强大引擎有什么意义呢？

examination_example.sentence: Questions are a <highlight>powerful</highlight> tool, especially when they encourage others to disclose information about themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题是一种强有力的工具，尤其是当它们鼓励他人透露自己的信息时。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe you carry the most <highlight>powerful</highlight> passport in the world, or perhaps the rarest passport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许你的护照是世界上最强大的，或者是最稀有的。

examination_example.sentence: There are systems that are more <highlight>powerful</highlight>, reliable and faster, but their employer simply will not put up the funds to buy them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些系统更强大、更可靠、更快，但他们的雇主根本不会出钱购买他们。

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of power to control people and events
sense_info_list.zh: 有影响力的; 有权力的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 强大的；强有力的；大功率的；效力大的；有影响力的；影响大的

word_family.mean: n. 权力；能力；本领；才智；支配力；影响力；体力；威力；力量；机械力；动力；电力；幂；乘方；指数；大量的

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of power to control people and events

examination_example.sentence: The Pompidou Centre in Paris is showing its respect and admiration for the artist and his <highlight>powerful</highlight> personality with an exhibition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎蓬皮杜中心举办了一场展览，以表达对这位艺术家及其强大个性的尊重和钦佩。

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of strength or force

examination_example.sentence: Their faces were so <highlight>powerful</highlight> in sending a message of their despair (绝望) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的面庞强有力地传递出了一种绝望的信息。

examination_example.sentence: They require a bigger commitment than smaller ones, and they have a more <highlight>powerful</highlight> effect on the feeling of a space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们比小的需要更大的承诺，对空间的感觉也有更强大的影响。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 强大的；强有力的；大功率的；效力大的；有影响力的；影响大的

word_family.mean: n. 权力；能力；本领；才智；支配力；影响力；体力；威力；力量；机械力；动力；电力；幂；乘方；指数；大量的

sense_info_list.en: having a lot of power to control people and events
sense_info_list.zh: 强大的; 有影响力的

examination_example.sentence: So how can we become <highlight>powerful</highlight> and start changes in our own life?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，我们怎样才能变得强大，开始改变自己的生活呢?

examination_example.sentence: We have a sense of duty to make our country more and more <highlight>powerful</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们有责任使我们的国家越来越强大。

examination_example.sentence: In a word, family members can make us full of energy and <highlight>powerful</highlight> all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，家庭成员可以让我们一直充满活力和力量。

examination_example.sentence: “Words are a <highlight>powerful</highlight> gift,” she said again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “语言是一种强大的天赋，”她又说。

examination_example.sentence: For children, growing their own food is a <highlight>powerful</highlight> tool to increase their intake of the food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对儿童来说，自己种植食物是增加食物摄入量的有力工具。

examination_example.sentence: As the Internet grows more <highlight>powerful</highlight>, students can access(获得) knowledge easily.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着互联网越来越强大，学生可以很容易地获取知识。

sense_info_list.en: having a strong effect on people's feelings or thoughts
sense_info_list.zh: 效力大的; 影响大的

examination_example.sentence: Dreams are <highlight>powerful</highlight> and they can drive you to work harder and become better than before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦想是强大的，它能驱使你更加努力地工作，变得比以前更好。

examination_example.sentence: Words  can have a <highlight>powerful</highlight> effect on your brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言可以对你的大脑产生强大的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Words have a <highlight>powerful</highlight> effect on your brain, and in turn it influences your action greatly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语言对你的大脑有强大的影响，反过来也会极大地影响你的行动。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 具有某种性质/倾向
